## Upcoming deadlines

-   Statistics Reflection 10/6 11:59 PM

## Learning Objectives

By the end of the class, students should be able to:

-   interpret categorical terms in an MLR model

-   interpret interaction terms in an MLR model

-   determine when interaction terms are useful
